title: Canada : total university enrollment 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of students in thousands has increased over the Year.
Number of students in thousands is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2017, and finally roughly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Number of students in thousands, about 1341.35 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Number of students in thousands, of value 1050.83 was reported at Year 2006
min_summary: In general Number of students in thousands has rose over the Year.
Number of students in thousands is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2017, and finally roughly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
